Line 155:  "   }\r\n\r\n    function LoadData(data, id) {\r\n\r\n        $.ajax({\r\n            url: " +
Line 156:  "\'/Account/ListTaxAgency\',\r\n            type: \"GET\",\r\n            dataType: \"JSON" +
Line 157:  "\",\r\n            data: { newsId: data },\r\n            success: function (lstItem)" +
Line 158:  " {\r\n                $(\"#TaxAgencyCode\").html(\"\"); // clear before appending new " +
Line 159:  "list \r\n                $.each(lstItem, function (i, ls) {\r\n                    i" +
Line 160:  "f (id != \'\' && id == ls.Value) {\r\n                        $(\"#TaxAgencyCode\").ap" +
Line 161:  "pend($(\'<option selected=\"selected\"></option>\').val(ls.Value).html(ls.Text));\r\n " +
Line 162:  "                   } else {\r\n                        $(\"#TaxAgencyCode\").append(" +
Line 163:  "$(\'<option></option>\').val(ls.Value).html(ls.Text));\r\n                    }\r\n\r\n " +
Line 164:  "               });\r\n            }\r\n        });\r\n    }\r\n</script>\r\n<div id=\"conte" +
Line 165:  "nt-title\">\r\n    <span>Đăng ký bảo hiểm xã hội điện tử</span>\r\n</div>\r\n<div id=\"d" +
Line 166:  "ivloading\">\r\n");
